description: Each player chooses a unique identifier (e.g., Player 1 and Player 2). The number to be guessed is chosen secretly by the game system or a non-participating third party.
The objective of the game is to correctly guess the secret number between 1 and 10 before the other player.
Players take turns guessing the secret number. Player 1 starts the game, followed by Player 2, and the turns alternate.
Players must guess a number between 1 and 10 during their turn. Invalid guesses (numbers outside this range) will be skipped, and the turn will be forfeited.
After each guess, the game system provides feedback indicating whether the guessed number is too low, too high, or correct.
The player who guesses the correct number first is declared the winner.
The game continues until one player correctly guesses the number. There is no time limit unless specified beforehand.
